nodes.text: The Kessel sector was a sector located in the Outer Rim Territories. The Kessel system was located within, which contained the planet Kessel and its infamous spice mines. The Kessel Sector also contained the planets Aeneid, Injopan, Mandrine, Randa, Tilurus, Zerm, and Oba Diah which headquarters of the Pyke Syndicate, was also located in the sector.
